message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $160.
Alice, I appreciate you being flexible, but $160 is still higher than what I'm comfortable paying.  I'm willing to go up to $120. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $140, which is a fair compromise.
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $140 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $130.  This is my final offer, as I can always get the product from John for $100.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I've already compromised quite a bit. I'm willing to meet you at $145, which is as low as I can go.
